ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at making you feel at ease (introducing themself, explaining their position, being friendly and warm towards you, treating you with respect; not cold or abrupt)
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at letting you tell your "story" (giving you time to fully describe your condition in your own words; not interrupting, rushing or diverting you)
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at really listening (paying close attention to what you were saying; not looking at the notes or computer as you were talking)
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at being interested in you as a whole person (asking/knowing relevant details about your life, your situation; not treating you as "just a number")
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at fully understanding your concerns (communicating that he/she had accurately understood your concerns and anxieties; not overlooking or dismissing anything)
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at showing care and compassion (seeming genuinely concerned, connecting with you on a human level; not being indifferent or "detached")
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at being positive (having a positive approach and a positive attitude; being honest but not negative about your problems)
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at explaining things clearly (fully answering your questions; explaining clearly, giving you adequate information, not being vague)
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at helping you to take control (exploring with you what you can do to improve your health yourself; encouraging rather than "lecturing" you)
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Regarding today's consultation, how good was the practitioner at making a plan of action with you (discussing the options, involving you in decisions as much as you want to be involved; not ignoring your views)
Notes: 1= Poor ; 2= Fair ; 3= Good ; 4= Very Good ; 5= Excellent ; 99= Does not apply

ElementDescription: Total CARE Measure Score from lowest to highest
